mapper.insert: insert into team (teamRegdate, endDate, teamName, teamGoal, userEmail, teamStatus) values(#{teamRegdate}, #{endDate}, #{teamName}, #{teamGoal}, #{userEmail}, #{teamStatus})
insert into task(userEmail, title, content, startDate, targetDate, teamNo) values(#{userEmail}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{targetDate}, #{teamNo})
mapper.select: select * from TASK where teamNo = #{teamNo} order by taskNo desc;
select teamNo from TEAM where teamName = #{teamName}
